Mod0_Description: When you Immobilize or Stun an enemy, you gain a Terramote. Each enemy hit by {c_important}Landslide{/c} consumes a Terramote causing a guaranteed Critical Strike with {c_number}[{SF_7} * 100|%x|]{/c} Critical Strike Damage. Bosses always have up to a {c_number}[{SF_8} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to grant a Terramote when hit.
Mod2_Description: When you strike an Immobilized or Stunned enemy with {c_important}Landslide{/c}, an additional pillar of earth is formed.
Mod1_Description: After {c_important}Landslide{/c} damages enemies {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} times, the next hit will Immobilize enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds.
name: Landslide
